name: 尊爵不凡 戰爭學院 拉克絲｜2022
description: 現在已是拉克絲在迪朗達爾學院的第二學年。折磨人的試煉、失敗與背叛不時在她還是新人的階段上刻上ㄧ筆又ㄧ筆，但她也因此變得更加堅強。在經過與ㄧ個神器持有者所展開的頂上對決後，拉克絲精通了她的所有能量並躋身為巫術俱樂部的領導人，同時更身負新任班代的角色。

wikiSkinData.distribution: Given to players who owned the original skin prior to patch 12.5
wikiSkinData.lore: Now in her second year at Durandal Academy, Lux has been hardened by the harrowing trials, losses, and betrayals that punctuated her freshman experience. Following the climactic clash with a certain Rogue God-Weapon, Lux has mastered her powers and risen to take her place as head of the Sorcery Club, as well as the new class president.
